game:pipeleaf-guide-text: Pipeleaf Guide This mod adds smoking pipes, shag blends, and a smoking system. Pipes are wearable items (equip them in the Face slot). They can be loaded with shag or shagblends and lit with a match. Some cut flowers and herbs (from Wildcraft mod) can be placed in a firepit to be fire-cured. Then, grind the fired-cured material in a quern to produce shag. Based on the source plant material, different effects are applied when smoked. Check the Handbook shag item types to learn what plants produce what effects! A new crop called Pipeleaf can be found in rainy temperate climates. Pipeleaf can be cultivated to produce Pipeleaf Shag. Using Pipeleaf Shag as a base, you can mix together two herb shags to produce a blend that combines some of the effects of both herbs!
smokingpipe-handbook-help-text:
1. Equip a pipe to the face slot.
2. Shift-RMB with a shag or shagblend in main hand to load empty pipe (requires 3 shag).
3. Select Match in hotbar an hold down RMB to light pipe.
4. Hold smoking hotkey (default 'R') to smoke. If held for more than 2 seconds and effect cooldown is ready, effect will be applied and cooldown timer started (2 min).
5. Keep pipe lit with hotkey or relight with Matches.

A loaded pipe can be reset by dropping in water.
game:blockdesc-flower-treeheath-*: Break with a shovel for a change to find a Briar Burl, an ingredient in the Briar Burl Smoking Pipe.

pipeleaf:no-fire: Must have a fire source in frame or in your left hand.
